code:
flowchart TB
  BYOD[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
  AVD[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
  CTRL[HealthTech_PatientRecords]

  subgraph DATA_PLANE[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    direction LR
    subgraph GW2_LANE[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
      direction TB
      GW2[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
      DOMSVC[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
      DEVSVC[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
      HWIL[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    end
    subgraph GW1_LANE[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
      direction TB
      GW1[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
      DOMAIN[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
      DEV[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
      SEG[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    end
  end

  BYOD -->|Internet| AVD
  AVD -->|tcp/udp 443 + udp 53| CTRL
  AVD -->|tcp/udp 443 + udp 53| GW2
  CTRL -->|tcp/udp 443 + udp 53| GW1
  AVD -->|tcp/udp 443 + udp 53| GW1
  CTRL -->|tcp/udp 443 + udp 53| GW2

  GW1 -->|All Ports| DOMAIN
  GW1 -->|All Ports| DEV
  GW1 -->|All Ports| SEG

  GW2 -->|All Ports| DOMSVC
  GW2 -->|All Ports| DEVSVC
  GW2 -->|All Ports| HWIL

  class CTRL,GW1,GW2 sdp
  classDef sdp fill:#d7f3ff,stroke:#1f7ea8,stroke-width:2px,color:#0b3d59

  class BYOD enduser
  classDef enduser fill:#ffe9d6,stroke:#e07a2c,stroke-width:2px,color:#5a2a00

  class AVD client
  classDef client fill:#e6f7e6,stroke:#2f8f2f,stroke-width:2px,color:#0f3d0f

  class DOMAIN,DEV,SEG sdpg
  classDef sdpg fill:#f0e6ff,stroke:#6f3cc3,stroke-width:2px,color:#2a0e5a

  class DOMSVC,DEVSVC,HWIL sdpt
  classDef sdpt fill:#f1f700,stroke:#6f3cc3,stroke-width:2px,color:#2a0e5a
